title: [QUESTION] Any examples of using a virtual canvas with SkiaSharp?
body:
Hello @mattleibow!

Are you aware of any code or samples that leverage a virtual canvas with SkiaSharp?  The use case we're trying to solve is something like the following:

- Looking to draw a large amount of graphics on top of a Map viewport.
- Would like to create a canvas that is much larger than the visible viewport without creating a 'real' canvas that size.
- As the map viewport is panned/zoomed, we want to pan/zoom the virtual canvas to that visible position, triggering a render of the canvas's visible viewport on top of the map control.

Thanks!
